info.description:
Shrink some elements on MeteoFrance weather forecast (new UI as of August 2020).
Because bank thinks that everyone is using its fat dirty fingers on a tablet, lazily lied in a couch.
This style tries to render the site usable again with a mouse and a brain.

Changelog
========

2020-08-06
=========
- Add support for hour canvas
- Shrink a bit more the time picker

2020-08-05
=========
Initial version
